text: وَإِذْ صَرَفْنَآ إِلَيْكَ نَفَرًا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنصِتُوا۟ ۖ فَلَمَّا قُضِىَ وَلَّوْا۟ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِم مُّنذِرِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We directed to you a few of the jinn, listening to the Qur'an. And when they attended it, they said, "Listen quietly." And when it was concluded, they went back to their people as warners.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan (ingatlah) ketika Kami hadapkan serombongan jin kepadamu yang mendengarkan Al Quran, maka tatkala mereka menghadiri pembacaan(nya) lalu mereka berkata: "Diamlah kamu (untuk mendengarkannya)". Ketika pembacaan telah selesai mereka kembali kepada kaumnya (untuk) memberi peringatan.
